title: No service on Sengkang LRT East Loop due to power fault

updates.text: 10/02, 9.39pm: Sengkang LRT East Outer Loop svc has resumed. Free bus rides & Bridging bus services have ceased. We are sorry.
10/02, 9.33pm: Sengkang LRT East Outer Loop svc has resumed. Free bus rides & Bridging bus services still available at designated stops.
10/02, 9.18pm: No svc on Sengkang LRT East Loop due to power fault. Free bus rides & Bridging bus svcs are available at designated stops.
10/02, 9.10pm: No svc on Sengkang LRT East Loop due to a power fault. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
